alert.note: Alert for Coconino; Navajo (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 10 at 3:22PM MST until September 10 at 6:30PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: The National Weather Service in Flagstaff has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... northeastern Coconino County in north central Arizona... northwestern Navajo County in north central Arizona... * Until 630 PM MST /730 PM MDT/. * At 321 PM MST /421 PM MDT/, National Weather Service Flagstaff Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain near Shonto. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Cow Springs, Shonto. This includes the following highways... Highway 160 between mile markers 352 and 367. This includes the following creeks, washes and rivers... Bitter Spring Wash, Porcupine Wash, Shonto Wash, Yellow Butte Wash, Narrow Wash, Last End Wash, Begashibito Wash and Moenkopi Wash. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
